column4: can anyone solve an issue for me.. I have a server ubuntu 10.04 forwarding ports to another machine and if I am outside of his network i can see the ports are open, but when I am connected to the internet behind the server (on his internel network) I cant see the ports .....
nmap shows the ports as closed from lan ( scanning the external ip )
but they are open if I ssh to a machine outside the servers lan
